entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
